Foto: Cisterna s nebezpečnou látkou skončila v jarku, pri nehode zasahovali hasiči
03 Nov 2019, 16:35 by Webnoviny
3.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) – Hasič zasahovali pri dopravnej nehode cisterny v katastri obce Abovce v okrese Rimavská Sobota, ktorá sa stala na štátnej ceste č. I/66. Ako píšu na svojom facebookovom profile, pri dopravnej nehode sa cisterna prevážajúca nebezpečnú látku – toluendiisokyanát, prevrátila do jarku pri ceste.
„Po príchode hasiči prezreli celý plášť cisterny, ktorý sa pri nehode nijako nepoškodil a nebezpečná látka neuniká do prostredia. Hasiči zachytávali unikajúce prevádzkové kvapaliny a pohonné hmoty z vozidla. Po príchode náhradnej cisterny budú do nej prečerpávať nebezpečnú látku. Pri nehode sa nikto nezranil. Pri nehode zasahovali hasiči z Tornale, Revúcej, Banskej Bystrice a Rimavskej Soboty,“ priblížilo Prezídium hasičského a záchranného zboru SR.

Photo: The tank with the dangerous substance ended in the spring, in the accident firefighters intervened
03 Nov 2019, 16:35 by Webnoviny
3.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) - Firefighter intervened in a road accident in the cadastre of Abovce village in the district of Rimavská Sobota, which happened on the state road no. I / 66th As they write on their facebook profile, in a traffic accident, the tank carrying a dangerous substance - toluene diisocyanate, flipped into the spring by the road.
“After the arrival firefighters inspected the entire tank shell, which was not damaged in the accident and dangerous substance does not leak into the environment. Firefighters captured escaping operating fluids and fuel from the vehicle. Upon arrival of the replacement tank, they will pump the hazardous substance into it. No one was injured in the accident. In the accident, firefighters from Tornale, Revúca, Banská Bystrica and Rimavská Sobota intervened, ”said the Presidium of the Fire and Rescue Service of the Slovak Republic.
